#cloud-config
ssh_pwauth: true
preserve_hostname: false
hostname: testDeb

users:
  - name: tecgpt
    plain_text_passwd: hubadmin
    no_user_group: true
    groups: sudo, adm
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    shell: /bin/bash
    ssh_authorized_keys:
      - ssh-rsa 
ssh_deletekeys: false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    jorge:hubadmin
  expire: False
